ygData.subject: Receiving is great (but it's fun to give too )
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh I do that too with my new guild : Lords of the Fallen currently we re a low level guild on the Bert server.  But with high ambitions.  I don t think
ygData.messageBody:
Heh I do that too with my new guild :>
Lords of the Fallen

currently we're a low level guild on the Bert server. But with high
ambitions. I don't think adversely to giving others armor you don't need
anymore.
Heh I gave a low level SK lizzie some armor just cause he was a guild member
and I didn't need it...

Heh...he felt bad cause he couldn't pay for it :>

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [SMTP:suceress@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2001 3:38 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] About loot order
>
>
> There are some really nice people I've encountered. i started a Rogue a
> few
> days ago. i was determined to not have her twinked. I'm running around
> with
> no armor and just the weapon I started with... I got to lvl 2 just turning
> in bardic mail without having to kill anything. Then some guy walks up and
> hands me 2pp. I reluctantly took it. Then another guy came up and gave me
> a
> Shiny Brass Shield. At first I tried to refuse but then figured I could
> give
> it to one of my mom's alts. Then some guy started offering me splitpaw
> armor. I tried to pay him for it but he wouldn't let me. So I ended up
> with
> all this stuff by lvl 3... The gnoll hide lariat rules though. I can't
> complain.
> luv,
> -Su
>
